question: 検索
sourceMnemonic: You <kanji>examine</kanji> then <kanji>search</kanji>. These are the steps you take in order to perform a <vocabulary>lookup</vocabulary> of some kind (or, as the case may be in modern times, do an <vocabulary>internet search</vocabulary>).
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
